title: A Match Made in Duty
description:
When the Earl of Exmoor agrees to marry Sophie as a favor to her dying brother, he never expects that this match made in duty will be the cure for his broken and battle-scarred heart.  NOTE: This novella was originally written and published as a part of the once limited edition 

 The Hearts of Courage

 box set, where proceeds went to Walter Reed Army Hospital. I hope you enjoy reading this Beauty and The Beast inspired story.
author: Meara Platt
